entry.title: Batman v Superman: World’s Finest
entry.summary:
Author: legobiwan

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,934Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Two of the world's greatest heroes are in the early days of their careers and meet each other as rivals. But when a common enemy threatens their way of life, they are forced to work together in order to save Earth and become the men they are destined to be. Batman and Superman must work together as a team to stop an enemy whose wealth and intelligence can win the battle alone.

entry.title: Demons
entry.summary:
Author: Legally_Spider-man (Bronwynnnn)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,344Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 160

Summary: Danny and Jazz flee Amity to Gotham in a panic running from the combined forces of Vlad and the GIW, Danny is still trying to let go of Damian and Jason and everything with the league knowing he can never go back.In Gotham he gets his little sister back, and now has to help rehabilitate Dan while trying to form a plan on taking down Vlad and the GIW.While with Damian he's been pushing down the guilt of losing his twin sister who he runs into in a random alley and disapears before he can find her.Note: This work was previously called "Demon Triplets", due to some plot changes and Me not really likeing the name it has changed.

entry.title: Self-control
entry.summary:
Author: Doralice

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,946Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 165

Summary: Saying Superman is just ‘grumpy’ would be an understatement: the man is like a wild cat normally, a rabid wild cat when he’s wounded. Like his primary instinct kicks in or something.“Is it a Kryptonians thing? Are Kryptonians all cranky like this or…?”“How would I know?” he growls, eyes still not meeting Bruce’s.Or: the one where Clark's biology is a bit more feral than what people can assume and the man spent his whole life hiding it to pass... until he happens to develop a crush on a certain insufferable billionaire-slash-vigilante capable of making him lose control.

entry.title: Attention (is the beginning of devotion)
entry.summary:
Author: Dopamine_Knight

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,419Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 23

Summary: .Bruce Wayne is a man of many secrets. His identity as Batman, the falsity of Brucie Wayne, his one-sided love that caused the fall of Gotham’s White Knight... And a current, silly crush that is not as bad as Selina makes it to be. He knows Clark Kent’s only secret: he is Superman. He tries to guard this secret as close as he can to his chest, but one night he slips. And he thinks he’s just made Clark’s hatred of him all the more justifiable. ...But does he? Does Kal-El have only one secret, after all? .

entry.title: It's Not One
entry.summary:
Author: kingsarah

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,779Chapters: 3/9Kudos: 48

Summary: One name written over a heart tying two people together. One pair of soulmates trying to figure out what that means.Clark and Bruce have finally come together and accepted each other as soulmates, but it’s not happily ever after yet. One thing after another causes turbulence in their budding relationship. Just because they are soulmates doesn’t mean the path is smooth. But maybe it’s not one thing that defines a relationship, but innumerable little actions over time.Sequel to Redamancy.

entry.title: The Buttered Cat Paradox
entry.summary:
Author: writersagainstwritersblock

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,795Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 300

Summary: “No comment.”“You don’t know what I was going to ask,” Clark said with a hint of a smile. “Maybe I just wanted to congratulate you on catching the Film Freak.”Bruce gave him a flat look.“Or maybe I think I can help.”“With a case of vandalism?”Clark stepped in front of him. “It’s not vandalism and you know it, detective.”“And what makes you say that?”“If it were vandalism it would be something a lot more juvenile. To the point. It wouldn’t claim there were seventeen missing kids. That’s public outcry.”“Is that so?”“That and I tried to do a story on the growing number of homeless children last month and I got shut down. According to the last count, the numbers have been decreasing, but there’s been no change in policies, no extra funding to CPS, or shelters, or even an increase in the number of inmates in the juvenile detention center. So where are they going?” Detective Bruce Wayne may have the highest solve rate in Gotham, but if he wants to solve this case, he’ll need the help of an elusive street kid, and while Dick Grayson always lands on his feet, he usually lands himself right into trouble.

entry.title: The Baddams Family Adventures
entry.summary:
Author: petting_a_bumblebee

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,287Chapters: 20/23Kudos: 1,168

Summary: Flash halted as a shadowy tendril leaped from Batman’s cape and slithered toward the side table. The tendril snatched a pie knife while its identical twin took a plate from the near pile. They cut a hefty piece, which they delivered to Batman’s waiting hand. Batman took a long and audible sniff off the treat before the slice and the plate vanished into his shadows.“As Flash stated, it is tasty”, Batman said emphatically in the sudden silence of the meeting room. “The plate was not bad either. IKEA?”- Batboy-centric glimpses of the life of the most lovable monster family in Gotham.
